display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in REM sleep (>= 5% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or NREM sleep time is 3
calculation: rdimrem5p = 60*(hrembp5 + hrop5 + carbp5 + carop5 + oarbp5 + oarop5 + marbp5 + marop5) / minremp
